Text: Guys, what happened to the download bar? it says: (problems with magnets links are fixed by updrading your torrent client!) But i have the latest Utorrent. Does this mean i have to get the paid version? Thanks for help. And thanks for uploading this :) Cheers
The Pirate Bay uses Magnet links now. Just click the 'Get This Torrent' button and utorrent (any version) will add it to the download list. Couldn't be easier.
